No Second Thoughts Speaking in an interview with Diane Sawyer of ABC News earlier this week, Donald Rumsfeld put it this way: What you know today can help you unthink your thinking about tomorrow. It can't help you with things you were thinking about back then, he said. ''Back then, there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein ] had these weapons.'' though. ''A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program,'' says an article on MSPmentor.net, which tracks the managed services provider market. MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers. The article asks, ''Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page?'' Spin off? While there's no reason to think Google would kill
